text: My name is John. I am someone who never went to college but always thought about it. I just turned sixty-four years old. There was an Advant-Age Programme at the local University. I decided to step out of my comfort zone and sign up.
question: What is TRUE of John, according to the text?

options.A: He made up his mind to change his way of life.
options.B: He decided to go to college together with his children.
options.C: He signed up for a free tuition programme.

explanation: У тексті зазначено, що Джон 'decided to step out of my comfort zone and sign up' (вирішив вийти із зони комфорту і записатися). Це прямо вказує на те, що він вирішив змінити свій звичний спосіб життя (change his way of life), реалізувавши стару мрію про коледж у 64 роки.

text: When you think of a robot, what do you see? Flying robots (29) _______ look like helicopters, or have wings like insects or birds.
question: Choose the correct variant for (29):
explanation: Тут ми говоримо про можливість (possibility). Модальне дієслово 'might' вживається для вираження припущення або ймовірності того, що роботи можуть виглядати як гелікоптери. 'Ought' потребує частку 'to', а 'have' та 'need' не підходять за змістом без додаткових дієслів.

text: Now, people of any age wear jeans because they are comfortable, practical and cheap. In the US they can be appropriate for all but the most formal (30) ______.
question: Choose the correct variant for (30):
explanation: Слово 'occasions' означає 'події' або 'випадки'. Контекст речення: джинси підходять для всіх випадків, крім найбільш офіційних заходів (formal occasions). Це стійке словосполучення в англійській мові.

text: FAMILY MOVIE NIGHT. FEATURING 'SPACECATS'. THURSDAY, APRIL 23. Free admission. Free snacks, face painting, and more.
question: What is offered for free at the event?
explanation: Текст оголошення прямо каже: 'Free admission' (безкоштовний вхід) та 'Free snacks, face painting'. Отже, варіант А є правильним.

text: As the smog came down onto the city, Winston Churchill, the Prime Minister at the time, insisted on continuing to burn coal (20) _________. He claimed the smog was in fact fog that would eventually lift. It wasn't until his secretary, Venetia Scott, suffered an accident that he took action.
question: Choose the correct variant for (20):

options.A: such as oil, natural gas, and electricity
options.B: that had descended on the capital
options.C: as well as in industrial furnaces
options.D: to give the illusion of a solid economy

explanation: В контексті речення мова йде про причину, чому Черчилль наполягав на спалюванні вугілля попри смог. Варіант D (щоб створити ілюзію стабільної економіки) найкраще підходить за історичним та логічним контекстом, показуючи політичну вмотивованість його рішення.

text: The story begins with Mortimer 'Mo' Folchart and his wife Resa reading the fairy tale 'Little Red Riding Hood' to their (25) _______ daughter Meggie.
question: Choose the correct variant for (25):
explanation: Уривок описує сцену читання казки на ніч. Слово 'young' (молода/маленька) є найбільш природним і часто вживаним епітетом для опису дитини в такому контексті. 'Infant' — це немовля (якому не читають довгі казки), а 'teenage' та 'adolescent' стосуються підлітків, що зазвичай уже не слухають читання казок батьками.

text: What a robot looks like depends on (28) _______ purpose. Cleaning robots often look like little vacuums.
question: Choose the correct variant for (28):
explanation: Мова йде про робота (a robot) в однині. Присвійний займенник для неживих предметів або абстрактних понять в однині — 'its'. Варіант 'their' підійшов би для множини, а 'his/her' — для людей.

text: VALLEY BIKE. Explore Pioneer Valley on a ValleyBike. Enjoy the Ride in eight cities and towns including Amherst, Easthampton, Holyoke, Northampton, South Hadley, Springfield, West Springfield and arriving soon, Chicopee!
question: According to the advertisement, ValleyBike is available in...
explanation: Текст прямо вказує: 'Enjoy the Ride in eight cities and towns'. Це чітко підтверджує варіант B. Також перераховані назви цих міст, що підсилює правильність вибору.

text: Whether they look like us or not, most robots have three essential ingredients that (32) _______ them a robot: sensors, actuators, and programs.
question: Choose the correct variant for (32):
explanation: Підмет у цьому підрядному реченні — 'ingredients' (інгредієнти), що є множиною. Для Present Simple у множині ми використовуємо дієслово без закінчення -s. Отже, 'ingredients that make'.

text: To improve your chances of success, start by choosing a clear and specific goal. Next, break it into smaller tasks that feel achievable. Write down your plan and track your progress regularly.
question: Which paragraph title matches this text?

options.B: Steps to make a resolution stick

explanation: Текст містить алгоритм дій: 'start by...', 'next...', 'write down...'. Це чіткі кроки (steps), щоб обіцянка 'приклеїлася' (stick), тобто була виконана.

text: The Great Smog of 1952 was a severe air-pollution event. It was (23) _______ by a period of cold weather, combined with an anticyclone and windless conditions.
question: Choose the correct variant for (23):
explanation: Дієслово 'caused' (спричинений) найкраще підходить для опису природних чи техногенних явищ. 'Happened' не вживається у пасивному стані (was happened — помилка).

text: If you (28) _______ to the gym more often last year, you would have felt much better now. But you didn't.
question: Choose the correct variant for (28):
explanation: Це Mixed Conditional (змішаний тип умовного речення). Умова стосується минулого (last year), тому в частині з 'If' використовуємо Past Perfect — 'had gone'.

text: ValleyBike share provides a sustainable and healthy transportation option. Members can pick up a bike at any station and return it to any other station within the network.
question: How does the bike-sharing system work?

options.A: You must return the bike to the starting station.
options.B: You can leave the bike anywhere on the street.
options.C: You can return the bike to any station in the system.
options.D: You need to own a bike to use the system.

explanation: Фраза 'return it to any other station within the network' прямо підтверджує варіант C. Це принцип роботи більшості систем bike-sharing.

text: The tradition (29) _______ back to the 18th century, when the first modern jeans were created for workers.
question: Choose the correct variant for (29):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'dates back to' або 'goes back to' використовується для опису історичного походження у Present Simple, навіть якщо мова про минуле.

text: New Year's resolutions are a great way to (30) _______ fresh and set new objectives for the upcoming months.
question: Choose the correct variant for (30):
explanation: Колокація 'start fresh' (почати з чистого аркуша) є дуже поширеною в англійській мові, особливо в контексті свят та планів.

text: Ancient Babylonians were the first (2) _______ this tradition of making resolutions thousands of years ago.
question: Choose the correct variant for (2):
explanation: Після порядкових числівників (the first, the second, the last) ми завжди використовуємо інфінітив з часткою 'to'. Тому правильно: 'the first to start'.

text: Benjamin Franklin tracked daily virtues like patience and organization to improve his character. He believed that consistent self-reflection was the key to personal growth.
question: What was the purpose of Franklin's daily tracking?

options.D: To track the magic in everyday life

explanation: Фраза 'to improve his character' прямо означає покращення особистих якостей (personal qualities). Це і було метою його щоденних записів.

text: Meghan Markle resolved to leave room (30) _______ 'seeing the magic' in everyday life, focusing on gratitude.
question: Choose the correct variant for (30):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'leave room for something' означає 'залишати місце/можливість для чогось'. В даному контексті — для того, щоб бачити магію в житті.

text: The smog was so thick that people (22) _______ see their own feet while walking. Public transport stopped working entirely.
question: Choose the correct variant for (22):
explanation: Мова йде про фізичну неможливість щось зробити в минулому. Для цього використовується модальне дієслово 'could' у заперечній формі 'couldn't' (не могли бачити).

text: If you want to (23) _______ success with your resolutions, start with a specific goal. Don't try to change everything at once.
question: Choose the correct variant for (23):
explanation: Дієслово 'achieve' (досягати) є найбільш влучним у парі зі словом 'success'. Хоча 'reach' також може означати досягнення, 'achieve success' — це стійка академічна колокація.

text: By the time the smog finally lifted, thousands of people (31) _______ from respiratory problems. It was a national tragedy.
question: Choose the correct variant for (31):
explanation: Оскільки подія (страждання людей) відбулася раніше іншої події в минулому (смог піднявся), ми маємо використовувати Past Perfect (had + V3).

text: LOST DOG. Golden Retriever, wearing a blue collar. Answers to the name 'Buddy'. Last seen near Central Park on Tuesday. Please call 555-0199.
question: How can someone identify the lost dog?

options.B: By its name and collar color
options.C: By the park where it lives

explanation: В оголошенні вказано дві ознаки: колір нашийника (blue collar) та ім'я (Buddy), на яке він відгукується. Це відповідає варіанту B.

text: Some companies do not like their (32) ______ to wear jeans for work, even on Fridays.
question: Choose the correct variant for (32):
explanation: Контекст речення: компанії не хочуть, щоб їхні *працівники* носили джинси. 'Employees' — це працівники, тоді як 'employers' — це роботодавці.

text: Studies show that about 80% of New Year's resolutions fail by the second week of February. Many people set goals that are too vague, like 'getting healthy,' without a plan. However, those who track their progress are 40% more likely to succeed.
question: What does the text focus on?
explanation: Текст оперує статистикою успіху та невдач (80% fail, 40% more likely to succeed), що прямо відповідає темі 'success rate' (показник успішності).

text: Janus, the Roman god of beginnings, is usually (24) _______ with two faces, one looking forward and one looking back.
question: Choose the correct variant for (24):
explanation: Коли ми говоримо про візуальне зображення богів чи персонажів у мистецтві, найкраще підходить слово 'pictured' (зображений/представлений на малюнку чи скульптурі).

text: The smog in London in 1952 was (23) _______ than any other fog in the city's history. It lasted for five consecutive days.
question: Choose the correct variant for (23):
explanation: Слово 'than' вказує на порівняння двох об'єктів. Для коротких прикметників (thick) порівняльна ступінь утворюється за допомогою суфікса -er.

text: The Advant-Age Programme at the local university offers seniors a chance to audit classes for free. It aims to promote lifelong learning and social connection among older adults.
question: What is the primary goal of the Advant-Age Programme?

options.B: To encourage education in later life
options.D: To sell books to senior citizens

explanation: Фраза 'promote lifelong learning... among older adults' прямо означає заохочення до навчання в старшому віці (later life).

text: Many students (26) _______ for the exam by studying late into the night, which is often counterproductive.
question: Choose the correct variant for (26):
explanation: Дієслово 'prepare' найкраще поєднується з прийменником 'for' у значенні 'готуватися до чогось' (prepare for the exam).

text: If I (32) _______ more time, I would join a gym to keep my resolution.
question: Choose the correct variant for (32):
explanation: Це умовне речення 2-го типу (Second Conditional), яке виражає уявну ситуацію в теперішньому. Структура: If + Past Simple, would + V1. Тому обираємо 'had'.

text: Robots are being used in hospitals to help surgeons (30) _______ complex operations with high precision.
question: Choose the correct variant for (30):
explanation: Після дієслова 'help' ми використовуємо або 'bare infinitive' (інфінітив без to), або 'to-infinitive'. Варіант 'perform' є правильним безчастковим інфінітивом.

text: The company (27) _______ a new model of electric cars last month to reduce CO2 emissions.
question: Choose the correct variant for (27):
explanation: Коли мова йде про випуск нового продукту на ринок, використовується професійний термін 'launch' (запустити/випустити).

text: The children were excited because they (28) _______ a robot for the first time in their lives.
question: Choose the correct variant for (28):
explanation: Тут ми бачимо причину емоції в минулому (were excited). Те, що вони побачили робота, сталося ще раніше, тому використовуємо Past Perfect (had seen).

text: Social media can have a significant (29) _______ on a person's mental health if used excessively.
question: Choose the correct variant for (29):
explanation: Слово 'impact' (вплив) найкраще поєднується з прийменником 'on'. Вираз 'have an impact on someone' є стандартним.

text: TOY DONATION DRIVE. Bring your gently used toys to the community center. We accept dolls, puzzles, and board games. No broken items, please. Help make a child's day brighter!
question: What is the requirement for the donated toys?

options.B: They should be in working condition.
options.D: They must be wrapped in gift paper.

explanation: Фраза 'No broken items' (ніяких зламаних речей) означає, що іграшки мають бути в робочому стані (working condition). Слово 'gently used' також підтверджує, що вони не обов'язково нові, але доглянуті.

text: Levi Strauss, a German immigrant, (34) _______ to San Francisco during the Gold Rush to open a dry goods business. He soon realized miners needed durable pants.
question: Choose the correct variant for (34):
explanation: Дієслово 'travel' найкраще пасує для опису тривалої поїздки або переїзду в інше місто чи країну. 'Arrived' потребувало б прийменника 'in', а 'reached' вживається без прийменника, але рідше в контексті еміграції.

text: The smog was so dense that it (24) _______ even inside buildings through small cracks in windows and doors.
question: Choose the correct variant for (24):
explanation: Смог (підмет) сам не може 'знайти', його 'було знайдено' (пасивний стан). Оскільки вся розповідь ведеться про події 1952 року, використовуємо Past Simple Passive: was found.

text: In 1873, Strauss and a tailor named Jacob Davis (25) _______ a patent for putting metal rivets in work pants, creating the first blue jeans.
question: Choose the correct variant for (25):
explanation: Офіційний документ, як-от патент, зазвичай 'отримують' (receive a patent). Це стандартна юридична та бізнес-термінологія.

text: CAUTION: WET FLOOR. Please use the alternative entrance while the cleaning crew is working in the main lobby. Thank you for your cooperation.
question: What should people do according to the sign?

options.A: Wait for the floor to dry.
options.B: Help the crew clean the floor.

explanation: Інструкція 'use the alternative entrance' означає, що потрібно скористатися іншим (альтернативним) входом або дверима.

text: By the end of the decade, jeans (32) _______ a worldwide fashion phenomenon, moving far beyond their origins as workwear.
question: Choose the correct variant for (32):
explanation: Конструкція 'By the end of...' (до кінця певного часу в минулому) є класичним маркером для Past Perfect (had + V3), оскільки дія завершилася до певного моменту.

text: Many teenagers prefer (31) _______ jeans to formal trousers because they feel more comfortable and independent.
question: Choose the correct variant for (31):
explanation: Після дієслова 'prefer' часто вживається герундій (V-ing), коли мова йде про загальне уподобання. 'Wearing' тут виступає в ролі доповнення.

text: If you are not (26) _______ with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund.
question: Choose the correct variant for (26):
explanation: Слово 'satisfied' (задоволений) найбільш офіційне і пасує до контексту прав споживачів. 'Satisfied with' — сталий вираз для оцінки якості товару.

text: The recycling program has been a huge success. Over the past year, the city has collected 500 tons of plastic and paper. This has significantly reduced the amount of waste sent to local landfills.
question: Which title fits the text?

options.D: How to sort your trash at home

explanation: Текст розповідає про успішні результати програми (collected 500 tons, reduced waste), що є досягненнями (achievements) у сфері управління відходами.

text: Don't forget (30) _______ the lights when you leave the room to save energy.
question: Choose the correct variant for (30):
explanation: Вираз 'forget to do something' означає 'забути зробити щось (майбутню дію)'. Оскільки людина ще не вийшла з кімнати, використовуємо інфінітив.

text: Environmentalists (27) _______ that we must act now to prevent irreversible damage to our planet's climate.
question: Choose the correct variant for (27):
explanation: Екологи 'попереджають' (warn). Дієслово 'tell' потребує додатка (tell someone), а 'warn' ідеально вводить підрядне речення з 'that'.

text: Mortimer 'Mo' Folchart has a unique gift: when he reads aloud from a book, the characters come to life in the real world. However, for every character that enters our world, someone from our world disappears into the book.
question: What is the consequence of Mo's gift?

options.B: An exchange happens between the book and reality.
options.C: He loses his ability to read.
options.D: The books he reads are destroyed.

explanation: Опис 'one enters, one disappears' вказує на обмін (exchange) між світом книги та реальною дійсністю.

text: She (29) _______ as a volunteer for three years before she finally got a permanent job at the animal shelter.
question: Choose the correct variant for (29):
explanation: Мова йде про тривалу дію, яка передувала іншій дії в минулому (got a job). Це Past Perfect Continuous, що підкреслює тривалість (for three years).

text: The university (28) _______ a wide range of courses, from computer science to classical literature.
question: Choose the correct variant for (28):
explanation: Навчальні заклади 'пропонують' курси. 'Offers' — найбільш влучне слово в академічному контексті.

text: Children (25) _______ more than two hours of screen time per day may develop sleep problems.
question: Choose the correct variant for (25):
explanation: Тут використано дієприкметниковий зворот (Participle Clause). 'Having' замінює 'who have' і описує ознаку дітей.

text: WANTED: Part-time assistant for a local bakery. Must be available early in the morning. Previous experience is preferred but not essential. Training will be provided.
question: What is mandatory for the candidates?
explanation: Слово 'Must' вказує на обов'язкову умову — 'be available early in the morning'.

text: I wish I (33) _______ how to play the guitar when I was younger.
question: Choose the correct variant for (33):
explanation: Конструкція 'I wish' для вираження жалю про минуле потребує використання Past Perfect (had learned).

text: To be a successful student, you need to (24) _______ attention to the details of every assignment.
question: Choose the correct variant for (24):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'pay attention to' (звертати увагу на) є базовою колокацією в англійській мові.

text: Before starting your workout, always perform a warm-up. This prepares your muscles and heart for the exercise, reducing the risk of injury. A five-minute walk or light stretching is usually enough.
question: What is the main advice of this text?
explanation: Текст фокусується на підготовці перед вправами (warm-up), що відповідає 'pre-exercise preparation'.

text: The scientist, (26) _______ discovery changed the world, was humble about his success.
question: Choose the correct variant for (26):
explanation: Займенник 'whose' вказує на приналежність — відкриття, яке належить вченому (вчений, чиє відкриття...).

text: The manager asked the team (27) _______ the report by Friday afternoon without fail.
question: Choose the correct variant for (27):
explanation: Дієслово 'ask' вимагає конструкції 'ask someone to do something' (інфінітив з to).

text: The new skyscraper has a (29) _______ view of the city from its top floor observatory.
question: Choose the correct variant for (29):
explanation: Прикметник 'breathtaking' (такий, що захоплює подих) є класичним епітетом для опису красивих краєвидів.

text: Jeans were once restricted in schools and theaters. In the 1950s, they were associated with rebellion and 'bad boys'. However, by the late 1960s, they became a symbol of freedom and equality for all.
question: How did the perception of jeans change over time?

options.A: They became less popular after the 60s.
options.B: They moved from being a symbol of revolt to a symbol of freedom.
options.C: They were always allowed in formal places.
options.D: They were only worn by elderly people.

explanation: Текст описує перехід від 'rebellion' (повстання/бунт) до 'symbol of freedom' (символ свободи).

text: While (30) _______ for the bus, I realized I had left my wallet at home.
question: Choose the correct variant for (30):
explanation: Після сполучника 'while' часто використовується герундій (V-ing) для скорочення підрядного речення часу.

text: It's (31) _______ to check the weather forecast before going on a long hike in the mountains.
question: Choose the correct variant for (31):
explanation: Слово 'sensible' означає 'розумний/доцільний'. 'Sensitive' — це 'чутливий', що не підходить за змістом.

text: By the time the sun rises tomorrow, we (32) _______ driving for eight hours.
question: Choose the correct variant for (32):
explanation: Це Future Perfect Continuous — дія, яка триватиме до певного моменту в майбутньому (tomorrow).

text: The local council decided to (33) _______ the old park into a modern sports complex.
question: Choose the correct variant for (33):
explanation: Дієслово 'transform' (перетворити) найкраще описує зміну вигляду або призначення об'єкта.

text: ATTENTION PASSENGERS: The 10:15 train to London is delayed by 20 minutes due to signaling problems. Please check the monitors for further updates.
question: What is the reason for the delay?
explanation: Фраза 'due to signaling problems' вказує на технічні проблеми з сигналами.

text: If you need (34) _______ information, feel free to visit our website.
question: Choose the correct variant for (34):
explanation: Слово 'further' використовується для позначення 'додаткової' або 'подальшої' інформації. 'Farther' зазвичай стосується лише фізичної відстані.

text: The student was (35) _______ for his hard work and dedication with a prestigious scholarship.
question: Choose the correct variant for (35):
explanation: Дієслово 'rewarded' (винагороджений) найкраще описує ситуацію, коли людина отримує щось за свої зусилля (hard work).

text: The Eiffel Tower was originally intended to be a temporary installation for the 1889 World's Fair. Many Parisians initially hated the structure, calling it a 'giant smokestack'. Today, it is one of the most visited landmarks in the world.
question: What was the original plan for the Eiffel Tower?

options.A: To be the tallest building forever.
options.B: To serve as a permanent radio tower.
options.C: To be removed after the World's Fair.
options.D: To replace all other monuments in Paris.

explanation: Слово 'temporary' (тимчасовий) означає, що споруду не планували залишати назавжди. Варіант C прямо підтверджує, що її мали прибрати після виставки.

text: The teacher suggested (36) _______ a short break before starting the next complex topic.
question: Choose the correct variant for (36):
explanation: Після дієслова 'suggest' (пропонувати) завжди вживається герундій (V-ing), якщо ми пропонуємо саму дію.

text: It is important to (37) _______ a balance between your studies and your social life to avoid burnout.
question: Choose the correct variant for (37):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'keep a balance' (підтримувати баланс) є найбільш природним у цьому контексті.

text: New technologies (31) _______ developed every day to make our lives easier and more efficient.
question: Choose the correct variant for (31):
explanation: Технології (множина) розробляються зараз. Використовуємо Present Continuous Passive: are + being + V3.

text: If you are traveling by train, remember that tickets bought online are often 30% cheaper than those purchased at the station. Also, booking in advance ensures you have a reserved seat.
question: What is the benefit of buying tickets online?

options.A: You get free food on the train.

explanation: Знижка 30% означає, що це вигідно з фінансової точки зору (cost-effective).

text: I can't afford (38) _______ a new laptop this month because I've already spent my budget.
question: Choose the correct variant for (38):
explanation: Дієслово 'afford' (дозволити собі фінансово) вимагає після себе інфінітив з часткою 'to'.

text: The movie was so (39) _______ that many people in the cinema were crying by the end.
question: Choose the correct variant for (39):
explanation: Прикметник 'moving' означає 'зворушливий'. 'Moved' стосується людини, яка відчуває зворушення (I was moved), а фільм сам по собі — 'moving'.

text: The more you practice, (32) _______ you will become at speaking English fluently.
question: Choose the correct variant for (32):
explanation: Це подвійний порівняльний ступінь (The... the...). Структура: The + порівняльний ступінь, the + порівняльний ступінь. Тому 'the better'.

text: NOTICE: The library will be closed for renovation from Monday, October 5th. It is expected to reopen in two weeks. Please return all borrowed books to the outdoor drop-box.
question: Where should people return books while the library is closed?

options.D: They should keep them until it reopens.

explanation: Слова 'outdoor drop-box' означають спеціальний ящик для книг, розташований зовні.

text: If it (40) _______ so much yesterday, we would have gone to the park.
question: Choose the correct variant for (40):
explanation: Це Third Conditional (жаль про минуле). Умова 'якби не дощило вчора' потребує Past Perfect: hadn't rained.

text: The manager decided to (41) _______ the meeting until next Tuesday because of the emergency.
question: Choose the correct variant for (41):
explanation: Фразове дієслово 'put off' означає 'відкладати на потім'.

text: Modern cars are equipped with numerous safety features, such as airbags and automatic braking systems. These innovations have significantly decreased the number of fatal accidents on the roads.
question: What is the impact of modern car innovations?

options.B: They increase the speed of vehicles.
options.C: They reduce the rate of deadly crashes.
options.D: They require more fuel to operate.

explanation: Фраза 'decreased the number of fatal accidents' синонімічна до 'reduce the rate of deadly crashes'.

text: He asked me (33) _______ I had seen his keys anywhere in the house.
question: Choose the correct variant for (33):
explanation: У непрямому запитанні, на яке можна відповісти 'так/ні', використовується сполучник 'if' або 'whether' (чи).

text: By next year, I (34) _______ from university and will be looking for a job.
question: Choose the correct variant for (34):
explanation: Конструкція 'By + майбутній час' вказує на завершену дію в майбутньому — Future Perfect (will have + V3).

text: The price of the tour (42) _______ accommodation, meals, and all entrance fees.
question: Choose the correct variant for (42):
explanation: Дієслово 'includes' (включає) найкраще підходить для переліку послуг у пакеті.

text: Volunteers needed for the local park clean-up! Join us this Saturday at 10 AM. Gloves and trash bags will be provided. Free refreshments for all participants.
question: What will be given to the volunteers?

options.D: A map of the city parks.

explanation: 'Gloves and trash bags' — це обладнання, а 'refreshments' — це перекус/напої (snacks).

text: I look forward (35) _______ you at the conference next month.
question: Choose the correct variant for (35):
explanation: Вираз 'look forward to' потребує після себе герундій (V-ing). Частка 'to' тут є прийменником, а не частиною інфінітива.

text: The bridge (36) _______ by a famous architect in the 19th century.
question: Choose the correct variant for (36):
explanation: Міст (підмет) був побудований (пасивний стан) у минулому (19 сторіччя). Використовуємо Past Simple Passive.

text: You should (43) _______ your password regularly to protect your online accounts.
question: Choose the correct variant for (43):
explanation: Змінювати пароль — 'change password'. Це стандартне словосполучення для цифрової безпеки.

text: FOR RENT: Spacious 2-bedroom apartment in the city center. Fully furnished, close to public transport. No pets allowed. Contact: 555-0122.
question: Which of the following is true about the apartment?

options.B: It is located in the suburbs.
options.D: It is a small one-room flat.

explanation: Фраза 'No pets allowed' прямо означає, що тварини заборонені (not permitted).

text: This is the (37) _______ book I have ever read; I couldn't put it down.
question: Choose the correct variant for (37):
explanation: Конструкція 'I have ever read' потребує найвищого ступеня порівняння прикметників (the most interesting).

text: The scientist (44) _______ a breakthrough that could lead to a cure for the disease.
question: Choose the correct variant for (44):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'make a breakthrough' (зробити прорив).

text: Online learning offers flexibility for students who have part-time jobs. They can access lectures and materials at any time, allowing them to balance work and education effectively.
question: Who benefits most from the flexibility of online learning?
explanation: Текст прямо згадує 'students who have part-time jobs' як тих, кому потрібна гнучкість.

text: Neither my brother nor my parents (38) _______ to go abroad this summer.
question: Choose the correct variant for (38):
explanation: У конструкції 'neither... nor...' дієслово узгоджується з найближчим до нього іменником. 'Parents' — множина, тому використовуємо 'want'.

text: The documentary provides a (45) _______ insight into the lives of polar bears in the Arctic.
question: Choose the correct variant for (45):
explanation: Слово 'valuable' (цінний) найкраще пасує до 'insight' (розуміння/бачення).

text: By the time we arrived at the cinema, the film (39) _______.
question: Choose the correct variant for (39):
explanation: Дія (фільм почався) відбулася до нашого прибуття в минулому. Використовуємо Past Perfect.

text: Many people believe that drinking eight glasses of water a day is essential for health. However, recent studies suggest that water intake varies greatly depending on age, climate, and activity levels.
question: What is the main finding of recent studies regarding water?

options.A: Everyone must drink exactly eight glasses.
options.B: Water is less important than food.
options.D: Only athletes need to drink water.

explanation: Слово 'varies' (змінюється/відрізняється) підтверджує, що потреби індивідуальні (individual needs differ).

text: He would rather (40) _______ at home tonight than go to the party.
question: Choose the correct variant for (40):
explanation: Після виразу 'would rather' використовується голий інфінітив (bare infinitive) без частки 'to'.

text: Can you (46) _______ me a favor and help me move this table?
question: Choose the correct variant for (46):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'do a favor' (зробити послугу).

text: SAFETY RULES: Do not use the elevator in case of fire. Use the stairs to exit the building immediately. Assemble at the designated point across the street.
question: What is the correct action during a fire?

options.A: Take the lift to the ground floor.
options.B: Wait in your room for help.
options.C: Leave the building using the stairs.
options.D: Call the fire department from the balcony.

explanation: Інструкція чітко каже 'Use the stairs' (використовуйте сходи) та не використовувати ліфт.

text: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system, visible even from outer space. It supports a wide diversity of life, including many vulnerable or endangered species. However, rising ocean temperatures are causing coral bleaching, which threatens its survival.
question: What is the main threat to the Great Barrier Reef?

options.D: Too many tourists visiting the reef.

explanation: Текст прямо вказує, що 'rising ocean temperatures' (підвищення температури океану) спричиняють знебарвлення коралів і загрожують системі.

text: The students (41) _______ the experiment for two hours when the alarm went off.
question: Choose the correct variant for (41):
explanation: Ми описуємо тривалу дію, яка відбувалася до певного моменту в минулому (when the alarm went off). Це сфера вживання Past Perfect Continuous.

text: If you want to (47) _______ a good impression at the interview, dress professionally and arrive on time.
question: Choose the correct variant for (47):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'make an impression' (справити враження).

text: He is much (36) _______ at mathematics than I am, although we are in the same class.
question: Choose the correct variant for (36):
explanation: Слово 'than' сигналізує про порівняльний ступінь. Виняткова форма від 'good' — 'better'.

text: Looking for an adventure? Join our mountain trekking tour this summer! We provide all necessary equipment and professional guides. Experience breathtaking views and challenge yourself in the wild.
question: What is offered to the participants of the tour?

options.C: A discount for the next trip.

explanation: 'Equipment' (спорядження/gear) та 'professional guides' (експертна допомога/expert assistance) — це те, що надає організатор.

text: The house, (42) _______ was built in 1920, is now being restored by the city council.
question: Choose the correct variant for (42):
explanation: Для неживих предметів (the house) у якості відносного займенника використовуємо 'which'.

text: The (48) _______ of the research was to identify the most effective way to reduce plastic waste.
question: Choose the correct variant for (48):
explanation: Слово 'purpose' (мета) найкраще підходить для опису цілі наукового дослідження.

text: You (33) _______ better stay at home today if you don't feel well.
question: Choose the correct variant for (33):
explanation: Стала конструкція 'had better' + дієслово без 'to' означає 'краще б тобі'.

text: URGENT: Do not open suspicious emails from unknown senders. They may contain viruses that can damage your computer or steal personal data. Always use updated antivirus software.
question: What is the main advice regarding emails?

options.C: Be cautious with messages from strangers.

explanation: Порада 'do not open suspicious emails from unknown senders' означає обережність із повідомленнями від незнайомців.

text: By the time he (43) _______ 25, he had already written two best-selling novels.
question: Choose the correct variant for (43):
explanation: У реченні з Past Perfect (had written) у підрядному реченні часу використовується Past Simple (was).

text: The company (49) _______ a loss this year due to the global economic crisis.
question: Choose the correct variant for (49):
explanation: Вираз 'make a loss' (зазнати збитків) — антонім до 'make a profit'.

text: The Leonardo da Vinci's 'Mona Lisa' is famous for her enigmatic smile. Millions of people visit the Louvre Museum in Paris every year just to see this masterpiece behind bulletproof glass.
question: Where can you see the 'Mona Lisa'?

options.A: In a private gallery in Rome.
options.B: At a special exhibition in London.
options.D: On the walls of the Eiffel Tower.

explanation: Текст прямо вказує на Лувр (Louvre Museum) у Парижі.

text: She (34) _______ her homework yet, so she can't go out with us.
question: Choose the correct variant for (34):
explanation: Маркер 'yet' (ще не) вказує на Present Perfect у заперечній формі.

text: If you (37) _______ enough sleep, you will feel much more energetic during the day.
question: Choose the correct variant for (37):
explanation: First Conditional: If + Present Simple, Future Simple. У частині з 'if' майбутній час (will) не вживається.

text: Can you (50) _______ the difference between these two brands of coffee?
question: Choose the correct variant for (50):
explanation: Вираз 'tell the difference' означає 'розрізняти/бачити різницю'.

text: Our library offers a quiet study space, free Wi-Fi, and access to thousands of digital resources. We also host monthly book clubs and creative writing workshops for teens.
question: What kind of activities for teenagers does the library provide?
explanation: 'Book clubs' та 'writing workshops' — це освітні та соціальні заходи.

text: The weather was (35) _______ bad that all flights were cancelled.
question: Choose the correct variant for (35):
explanation: Конструкція 'so + прикметник + that' використовується для підсилення причини.

text: The information (44) _______ by the detective was crucial for solving the case.
question: Choose the correct variant for (44):
explanation: Тут використано Passive Participle (дієприкметник минулого часу) — 'інформація, знайдена детективом'.

text: It's difficult to (51) _______ a living as a street performer in a small town.
question: Choose the correct variant for (51):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'make a living' (заробляти на життя).

text: MOVIE NIGHT: Every Friday at the student lounge. This week we are showing 'Inception'. Free popcorn for everyone who arrives before 7:00 PM!
question: How can a student get free popcorn?
explanation: Потрібно прийти до 7 вечора (arrives before 7:00 PM), що означає 'прийти завчасно'.

text: She doesn't mind (38) _______ extra hours if it helps the team succeed.
question: Choose the correct variant for (38):
explanation: Після дієслова 'mind' (заперечувати/мати щось проти) завжди вживається герундій (V-ing).

text: Many people have (52) _______ up their old habits and started a healthier lifestyle recently.
question: Choose the correct variant for (52):
explanation: Фразове дієслово 'give up' означає 'кинути/залишити' (звичку).

text: The Great Wall of China was built over many centuries to protect the Chinese Empire from invasions. Contrary to popular belief, it is not a single continuous wall, but a collection of walls and fortifications.
question: What is a common misconception about the Great Wall of China?

options.A: It was built in one year.
options.B: It is one unbroken line of wall.
options.C: It was never used for defense.

explanation: Текст спростовує 'popular belief' (поширену оману), що це 'single continuous wall' (єдина безперервна стіна).

text: The news (45) _______ as a shock to everyone in the office.
question: Choose the correct variant for (45):
explanation: 'News' — це незлічуваний іменник в однині. Правильна форма минулого часу — 'came'.

text: The manager (53) _______ the staff for their excellent performance during the busy season.
question: Choose the correct variant for (53):
explanation: Дієслово 'praised' (похвалив) найбільш доречне для професійного фідбеку за гарну роботу.

text: If I (40) _______ you, I would talk to the teacher about the problem.
question: Choose the correct variant for (40):
explanation: Second Conditional (порада): 'If I were you' — усталена форма для будь-якої особи.

text: Lost your keys? Found items are kept at the Security Office for 30 days. Please bring an ID and a detailed description of your item to claim it.
question: What is required to get a lost item back?

options.B: A witness to confirm it's yours.
options.C: Proof of identity and item details.
options.D: An official letter from the police.

explanation: Потрібно принести 'ID' (посвідчення особи) та 'detailed description' (опис деталей).

text: There isn't (46) _______ sugar in the bowl; we need to buy some.
question: Choose the correct variant for (46):
explanation: У заперечних реченнях із незлічуваними іменниками використовується 'any'.

text: I will (54) _______ my best to finish the project on time.
question: Choose the correct variant for (54):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'do one's best' (зробити все можливе).

text: The car (47) _______ by my father since I don't have a license yet.
question: Choose the correct variant for (47):
explanation: Passive Voice у Present Simple: машина (підмет) керується батьком.

text: The Sydney Opera House is an iconic performing arts centre in Australia. Designed by Danish architect Jørn Utzon, it was formally opened in 1973. Its unique shell-like structure makes it one of the most distinctive buildings of the 20th century.
question: What makes the Sydney Opera House stand out?

options.A: It is the oldest building in Australia.
options.C: It was designed by a local architect.
options.D: It is located in the middle of a desert.

explanation: Текст описує будівлю як 'unique shell-like structure' (унікальна структура, схожа на мушлю), що відповідає варіанту B.

text: By the time we reach the summit, we (48) _______ for over five hours.
question: Choose the correct variant for (48):
explanation: Це Future Perfect Continuous. Ми вказуємо на тривалість дії (for over five hours) до певного моменту в майбутньому (by the time we reach).

text: It’s easy to (55) _______ touch with old friends if you don't make an effort to call them.
question: Choose the correct variant for (55):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'lose touch with someone' (втратити зв'язок з кимось).

text: The cake (41) _______ by the time the guests arrived, so it was still warm.
question: Choose the correct variant for (41):
explanation: Дія відбулася безпосередньо перед іншою подією в минулому (guests arrived). Використовуємо Past Perfect Passive.

text: Our city tour includes a visit to the historical museum, a walk through the botanical gardens, and a boat trip along the river. Lunch is provided at a traditional local restaurant.
question: What is included in the tour package besides sightseeing?

options.C: A meal at a local eatery.

explanation: 'Lunch provided at a restaurant' відповідає варіанту 'a meal at a local eatery'.

text: I suggest (49) _______ the tickets in advance to get a better price.
question: Choose the correct variant for (49):
explanation: Після дієслова 'suggest' використовується герундій (V-ing).

text: The new law will (56) _______ into effect starting next month.
question: Choose the correct variant for (56):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'come into effect' (набути чинності).

text: Neither of the candidates (35) _______ enough experience for this position.
question: Choose the correct variant for (35):
explanation: Займенник 'neither' вимагає дієслова в однині (has).

text: ATTENTION: All passengers must stay behind the yellow line while the train is entering the station. Do not attempt to board until the doors are fully open.
question: What is the safety instruction for passengers?

options.B: Keep a safe distance from the tracks.
options.D: Run to the train as it arrives.

explanation: 'Stay behind the yellow line' — це вимога триматися на безпечній відстані від колій.

text: If I (50) _______ more attention in class, I would have passed the test easily.
question: Choose the correct variant for (50):
explanation: Third Conditional (жаль про минуле): If + Past Perfect, would have + V3.

text: The athlete was (57) _______ of cheating after the drug test results came back positive.
question: Choose the correct variant for (57):
explanation: Дієслово 'accused' завжди вживається з прийменником 'of' (accused of something).

text: Artificial Intelligence is no longer a concept of science fiction. It is used in everything from smartphone assistants to medical diagnostics, changing how we live and work every day.
question: What is true about Artificial Intelligence according to the text?

options.B: It has many practical applications today.
options.C: It is dangerous for human health.
options.D: It is only used by scientists.

explanation: Текст каже, що ШІ використовується в багатьох сферах (смартфони, медицина), що означає 'practical applications'.

text: This is the man (37) _______ daughter won the national spelling bee.
question: Choose the correct variant for (37):
explanation: Відносний займенник 'whose' вказує на приналежність (чия донька).

text: The children were tired because they (38) _______ in the garden all afternoon.
question: Choose the correct variant for (38):
explanation: Тривала дія, що передувала стану 'were tired' у минулому — Past Perfect Continuous.

text: I need to (58) _______ an appointment with the dentist because I have a toothache.
question: Choose the correct variant for (58):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'make an appointment' (записатися на прийом).

text: The annual book fair features authors from around the world. Visitors can attend readings, participate in workshops, and get their favorite books signed.
question: What can visitors do at the book fair?

options.A: Learn how to write their own stories.

explanation: 'Participate in workshops' (брати участь у майстер-класах) часто включає навчання письму.

text: You (39) _______ wear a suit to the party, but you can if you want to look formal.
question: Choose the correct variant for (39):
explanation: 'Don't have to' виражає відсутність необхідності (не обов'язково).

text: The more books you read, (51) _______ your vocabulary will become.
question: Choose the correct variant for (51):
explanation: Подвійний порівняльний ступінь: The + comparative, the + comparative.

text: The plane (59) _______ off on time despite the heavy fog at the airport.
question: Choose the correct variant for (59):
explanation: Фразове дієслово 'take off' означає 'злітати' (про літак).

text: GARAGE SALE: Saturday, 8 AM - 2 PM. Furniture, kitchenware, and clothes. Everything must go! Cash only.
question: What is a condition of the garage sale?

options.A: You can pay with a credit card.
options.B: The sale happens on a weekday.

explanation: 'Cash only' означає, що приймається лише готівка.

text: I wish it (40) _______ raining; I want to go for a walk.
question: Choose the correct variant for (40):
explanation: Бажання, щоб ситуація в теперішньому змінилася (особливо коли це дратує), виражається через 'wish + would'.

text: She has a (60) _______ range of interests, from scuba diving to ancient history.
question: Choose the correct variant for (60):
explanation: Стала колокація 'a wide range of' (широкий спектр).

text: Polar bears rely on sea ice to hunt seals, their primary food source. As the Arctic ice melts due to global warming, these bears must travel longer distances, which puts their survival at risk.
question: Why is melting ice a problem for polar bears?

options.C: They have too many seals to eat.

explanation: Сталий вираз 'make a living' (заробляти на життя).

text: The news (33) _______ so shocking that nobody could believe it at first.
question: Choose the correct variant for (33):
explanation: Слово 'news' в англійській мові завжди в однині.

text: FREE ADMISSION: The Modern Art Gallery is free for students every first Sunday of the month. Valid student ID required at the entrance.
question: When can students visit the gallery for free?

options.B: Once a month on a specific day.

explanation: 'Every first Sunday of the month' — це конкретний день раз на місяць.

text: While my car (43) _______, I decided to go for a short walk.
question: Choose the correct variant for (43):
explanation: Тривала дія в пасивному стані в минулому — Past Continuous Passive.

text: The scientist (49) _______ a significant discovery in the field of genetics.
question: Choose the correct variant for (49):
explanation: Стала колокація 'make a discovery' (зробити відкриття).

text: Honeybees are essential for the environment as they pollinate about one-third of the food we eat. However, their population is declining due to pesticides and loss of habitat.
question: Why are honeybees important for humans?

options.A: They produce a lot of sugar.
options.B: They help in the production of many crops.
options.C: They protect other insects from diseases.
options.D: They are the only source of wax.

explanation: Запилення третини їжі (pollinate one-third of the food) означає допомогу у вирощуванні культур (crops).

text: You (34) _______ to bring your own laptop; the school provides them.
question: Choose the correct variant for (34):
explanation: Відсутність необхідності: 'don't have (to)'. Перед 'to' підходить лише 'have'.

text: I wish I (37) _______ more time to travel when I was younger.
question: Choose the correct variant for (37):
explanation: Жаль про минуле після 'wish' виражається через Past Perfect (had + V3).

text: Can you (50) _______ the difference between these two smartphones?
question: Choose the correct variant for (50):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'tell the difference' (розрізняти).

text: Healthy Lifestyle Tips: Drink at least 2 liters of water daily. Walk for 30 minutes in the fresh air. Include more vegetables in your diet and avoid sugary drinks.
question: What is recommended regarding nutrition?
explanation: 'Include more vegetables' відповідає варіанту 'increase intake of plant-based food'.

text: The more you practice, (35) _______ you will become at playing the piano.
question: Choose the correct variant for (35):
explanation: Подвійне порівняння: The + comparative..., the + comparative...

text: The information (44) _______ by the manager was very useful.
question: Choose the correct variant for (44):
explanation: Passive Participle (дієприкметник): 'інформація, надана менеджером'.

text: The flight was cancelled (51) _______ to heavy snow at the airport.
question: Choose the correct variant for (51):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'due to' (через/завдяки).

text: LOST DOG: Golden Retriever, answers to the name 'Buddy'. Last seen near the Central Park. Please call 555-1234 if you have any information.
question: What is the name of the lost dog?
explanation: У тексті прямо сказано: 'answers to the name Buddy'.

text: He suggested (38) _______ a break after three hours of continuous work.
question: Choose the correct variant for (38):
explanation: Дієслово 'suggest' потребує герундія (V-ing).

text: He has (52) _______ up smoking recently to improve his health.
question: Choose the correct variant for (52):
explanation: Фразове дієслово 'give up' (кинути/залишити звичку).

text: The Great Wall of China is not a single continuous wall but a collection of walls and fortifications built over several centuries to protect the borders of the Chinese Empire.
question: How was the Great Wall constructed?

options.A: As one long line of stone.
options.B: By different rulers over a long time.
options.C: In just ten years by one emperor.

explanation: Фраза 'over several centuries' означає тривалий час і різних правителів.

text: The house, (45) _______ was built in 1920, is being renovated.
question: Choose the correct variant for (45):
explanation: Відносний займенник 'which' для неживих предметів.

text: The manager (53) _______ that the meeting would be postponed until Friday.
question: Choose the correct variant for (53):
explanation: У непрямій мові без вказівки адресата використовуємо 'said'.

text: She is (40) _______ teacher I have ever had.
question: Choose the correct variant for (40):
explanation: Найвищий ступінь порівняння прикметника 'good'.

text: Cooking Class: Learn to bake bread and pastries. No experience needed. All ingredients provided. Every Saturday from 10 AM to 1 PM.
question: Who can attend this class?

options.D: Only people with their own ingredients.

explanation: 'No experience needed' означає, що клас відкритий для всіх.

text: None of the students (46) _______ finished the task yet.
question: Choose the correct variant for (46):
explanation: Після 'none of' дієслово зазвичай ставиться в однину (традиційна граматика НМТ).

text: I need to (54) _______ an appointment with my dentist.
question: Choose the correct variant for (54):
explanation: Сталий вираз 'make an appointment' (записатися на прийом).

text: The report (47) _______ by the end of the day.
question: Choose the correct variant for (47):
explanation: Майбутня дія в пасивному стані — Future Simple Passive.

text: The Amazon Rainforest is home to more than 390 billion individual trees. It plays a vital role in regulating the Earth's climate by absorbing vast amounts of carbon dioxide.
question: What is a major function of the Amazon Rainforest?

options.A: It provides wood for all countries.
options.B: It helps control the global climate.
options.C: It is the only source of fresh water.

explanation: 'Regulating the Earth's climate' означає контроль клімату.

text: By the time we arrived, the movie (48) _______.
question: Choose the correct variant for (48):
explanation: Дія відбулася раніше за іншу подію в минулому — Past Perfect.

text: The company decided to (55) _______ the new marketing strategy.
question: Choose the correct variant for (55):
explanation: 'Adopt' означає прийняти/впровадити щось нове.

text: He denied (49) _______ the window, although he was seen near it.
question: Choose the correct variant for (49):
explanation: Після 'deny' використовується герундій.

text: WEATHER ALERT: Heavy rain and strong winds expected this evening. Residents are advised to stay indoors and secure outdoor furniture.
question: What should people do according to the alert?

options.A: Go for a walk in the park.

explanation: 'Stay indoors' означає залишатися всередині приміщень.

text: The students were (50) _______ to hand in their essays by Friday.
question: Choose the correct variant for (50):
explanation: Passive Voice: студентам сказали (було сказано).

text: The price of electricity is expected to (56) _______ next month.
question: Choose the correct variant for (56):
explanation: 'Rise' — це неперехідне дієслово (підніматися самому).

text: I’d rather (51) _______ by train than by plane.
question: Choose the correct variant for (51):
explanation: Після 'would rather' вживається інфінітив без 'to'.

text: Job Fair: Meet top employers from various industries. Bring copies of your CV and dress professionally. Free workshops on interview techniques available.
question: What can you learn at the job fair?

options.B: How to behave during an interview.
options.C: How to start your own business.
options.D: How to dress for a party.

explanation: 'Workshops on interview techniques' навчать правилам поведінки на співбесіді.

text: If I (52) _______ you, I wouldn't worry about it.
question: Choose the correct variant for (52):
explanation: Second Conditional для поради: 'If I were you'.

text: The manager (57) _______ out several mistakes in the report.
question: Choose the correct variant for (57):
explanation: Фразове дієслово 'point out' — вказувати на щось.

text: This is the first time I (53) _______ such a beautiful sunset.
question: Choose the correct variant for (53):
explanation: Після 'This is the first time' використовуємо Present Perfect.

text: The Internet has revolutionized the way we communicate. It allows people to stay in touch with friends and family across the globe instantly through social media and email.
question: How has the Internet changed communication?

options.A: It has made it more expensive.
options.B: It has made it much faster.
options.C: It has limited people to local news.
options.D: It has replaced all face-to-face meetings.

explanation: Слово 'instantly' (миттєво) означає високу швидкість (much faster).

text: She (54) _______ for the company for ten years before she resigned.
question: Choose the correct variant for (54):
explanation: Тривала дія до певного моменту в минулому — Past Perfect Continuous.

text: It took him a long time to (58) _______ over the shock of the accident.
question: Choose the correct variant for (58):
explanation: Фразове дієслово 'get over' — оговтатися від чогось.

text: None of the information (55) _______ by the witness was true.
question: Choose the correct variant for (55):
explanation: Passive Participle: 'інформація, надана свідком'.

text: LIBRARY NOTICE: Quiet study area. No food or drinks allowed. Please put your mobile phones on silent mode.
question: What is permitted in the library?
explanation: Дозволено використовувати телефон у беззвучному режимі.

text: The problem (56) _______ right now by our technical team.
question: Choose the correct variant for (56):
explanation: Дія відбувається зараз у пасивному стані — Present Continuous Passive.

text: The teacher (59) _______ the importance of regular homework.
question: Choose the correct variant for (59):
explanation: Дієслово 'stress' (наголошувати) найкраще пасує до контексту.

text: By next Friday, I (57) _______ this book.
question: Choose the correct variant for (57):
explanation: Дія завершиться до певного моменту в майбутньому — Future Perfect.

text: The first computer programmer was actually a woman named Ada Lovelace. In the mid-19th century, she realized that machines could do more than just simple calculations and wrote the first algorithm intended to be carried out by a machine.
question: What did Ada Lovelace contribute to history?

options.A: She invented the first physical computer.
options.B: She was the first to create instructions for a machine.
options.C: She focused only on basic mathematics.
options.D: She built the first electronic calculator.

explanation: Текст зазначає, що вона написала перший алгоритм для машини ('first algorithm intended to be carried out by a machine').

text: If I (41) _______ about the traffic jam, I would have taken the subway.
question: Choose the correct variant for (41):
explanation: Third Conditional: умова в минулому потребує Past Perfect.

text: The company had to (63) _______ off several employees due to the economic crisis.
question: Choose the correct variant for (63):
explanation: Фразове дієслово 'lay off' означає 'звільняти (через скорочення)'.

text: Space Camp: A five-day program for teenagers interested in astronomy. Experience zero-gravity simulations and learn how to navigate a space shuttle. Booking opens in March.
question: Who is this program designed for?

options.B: Young people with an interest in space.

explanation: 'Teenagers interested in astronomy' — це молодь, що цікавиться космосом.

text: She (42) _______ for her keys for twenty minutes before she found them in her coat.
question: Choose the correct variant for (42):
explanation: Тривала дія до моменту в минулому (found) — Past Perfect Continuous.

text: I can't afford (45) _______ a new laptop this month.
question: Choose the correct variant for (45):
explanation: Після дієслова 'afford' (дозволити собі фінансово) завжди вживається інфінітив з 'to'.

text: It’s hard to (64) _______ up with a better solution to this problem.
question: Choose the correct variant for (64):
explanation: Фразове дієслово 'come up with' означає 'придумати/запропонувати (ідею)'.

text: MUSEUM ANNOUNCEMENT: Please refrain from using your phone while in the exhibition halls. Photography is permitted, but without flash.
question: What is allowed in the museum?
explanation: Текст дозволяє фото ('photography is permitted'), але без спалаху ('without flash').

text: The new bridge (43) _______ by the end of next year.
question: Choose the correct variant for (43):
explanation: Future Perfect Passive: дія завершиться до певного моменту в майбутньому.

text: He (65) _______ a great deal of effort into his final project.
question: Choose the correct variant for (65):
explanation: Стала колокація 'put effort into' (докладати зусиль до чогось).

text: I suggest (46) _______ to the doctor if your headache doesn't stop.
question: Choose the correct variant for (46):
explanation: Після дієслова 'suggest' використовується герундій (V-ing).

text: Many people believe that sharks are naturally aggressive towards humans. In reality, most shark attacks occur because the shark mistakes a human for its natural prey, like a seal.
question: According to the text, why do sharks usually attack humans?

options.C: They confuse humans with their usual food.

explanation: 'Mistakes a human for its natural prey' означає, що вони плутають людей зі своєю звичною їжею.

text: None of the guests (44) _______ the party early, which surprised the host.
question: Choose the correct variant for (44):
explanation: Констатація факту в минулому — Past Simple.

text: The manager (66) _______ responsibility for the mistake in the report.
question: Choose the correct variant for (66):
explanation: Стала колокація 'take responsibility' (взяти на себе відповідальність).

text: By the time the sun rises, we (47) _______ for six hours.
question: Choose the correct variant for (47):
explanation: Future Perfect Continuous: тривалість дії до моменту в майбутньому.

text: Photography Workshop: Learn the basics of lighting, composition, and editing. Participants must bring their own camera. The course lasts for three weekends.
question: What is a requirement for this workshop?

options.D: Paying for the camera during the class.

explanation: 'Bring their own camera' означає необхідність мати власне обладнання.

text: This is the car (45) _______ I told you about last week.
question: Choose the correct variant for (45):
explanation: Відносний займенник 'which' (або 'that') використовується для неживих предметів.
